text: Jean-Théodore Cocteau (1798–1838) was a herpetologist who was associated with Dumeril and Cuvier and corresponded with other workers in zoology around the world. J. T. Cocteau published a volume on skinks, Etudes sur les Scincoïdes, and a number of new taxa. == References == Category:French herpetologists Category:1798 births Category:1838 deaths
title: Jean-Théodore Cocteau
